br.com.conductor.conf

Class SpringServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.context.AbstractContextLoaderInitializer
      • org.springframework.web.servlet.support.AbstractDispatcherServletInitializer
        • org.springframework.web.servlet.support.AbstractAnnotationConfigDispatcherServletInitializer
          • br.com.conductor.conf.SpringServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.web.WebApplicationInitializer

    public class SpringServlet
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.support.AbstractAnnotationConfigDispatcherServletInitializer
    SpringServlet possui todos os metodos de inicializacao do Spring MVC sem o uso de arquivos xml o que facilita muito a sua manutenção
    Since:
    09/08/2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jhonatan Colina
